name: Killer Bytes
description:
This is my Ludum Dare 42 Entry,

Due to being completely new to Godot Engine and Linux, I kinda kinda struggled keeping up with time. So as of writing this there is no Sound like at all. I did my best with what i could do and I am fairly happy with the product since it was my first time with Godot. Please click on INFO to see how to play.

GAMEPLAY:

You are Kasper, An Anti-Virus who defends the A Memory Chip from Virus at the same time protecting the Good Apps

USE Arrow Keys for movement and Press Z for Shooting Laser

GOAL:

Protect the memory as long as you can.
Good apps Spawn randomly in random location, go and search for them and pick up up (Touch em).
Don’t let good apps stay out for too long as it will get corrupted.
Don’t Kill Good App, This will also corrupt the memory.

DESCRIPTION:

At first i wanted to add more features and other gameplay elements but due to lack of experience with godot. I ended up with this.I wanted to abandon the project but I didn’t wanna quit LD42 so Hope you guys Enjoy. I am quite happy with how it turned out but I wish i had more time to implement some basic features like high score, Sounds effects and Improve Graphics
